content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers:
The structure has 3 distinct layers with a total of 7 building blocks:
- Bottom layer: 2 red arch blocks
- Middle layer: 2 yellow rectangular blocks
- Top layer: 1 red arch block (house body) with 2 orange triangular roof pieces

## Spatial Relationships:
- The bottom layer consists of two red arch blocks positioned side by side with a gap between them
- The middle layer has two yellow rectangular blocks placed horizontally across the top of the red arch blocks
- The top layer has a red arch block (forming a house body) sitting on top of the yellow blocks
- Two orange triangular roof pieces form the roof of the house, meeting at the peak

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, we need the following blocks:
- Block #1: Red arch block (left side of bottom layer)
- Block #2: Red arch block (right side of bottom layer)
- Block #8: Yellow rectangular block (front middle layer)
- Block #9: Yellow rectangular block (back middle layer)
- Block #2: Red arch block (for house body at top layer) - using this again
- Block #14: Orange triangular roof piece (left side)
- Block #16: Orange triangular roof piece (right side)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 2
   Step3: Move block with index 8
   Step4: Move block with index 9
   Step5: Move block with index 2
   Step6: Move block with index 14
   Step7: Move block with index 16
}
```
